about_the_game:
Step into a world of stark contrasts and mind-bending puzzles with Voidstepper. Immerse yourself in a uniquely stylized 2D platformer where the simplicity of pure black and white aesthetics belies the complexity of its challenges.



GRAVITY MANIPULATION

You must defy the laws of physics by stepping into the Void. Enter the Void to discover new pathways, solve intricate puzzles, evade enemies and unlock hidden secrets.



DESTRUCTIBLE TERRAIN

Utilize the environment to your advantage. Destroy any terrain to create barriers against deadly turrets and lasers, or carve your way to reach otherwise inaccessible heights.



FEATURES

  • Minimalist Art Style: Experience the elegance of pure black-and-white graphics that enhance the game's challenging and immersive nature.
  • Dynamic Puzzles: Engage with puzzles that require both brainpower and dexterity, offering a satisfying blend of cognitive and physical challenges.
  • Strategic Terrain Manipulation: Innovatively use destructible environments to block hazards, build paths, and create safe zones in real-time.
detailed_description:
Step into a world of stark contrasts and mind-bending puzzles with Voidstepper. Immerse yourself in a uniquely stylized 2D platformer where the simplicity of pure black and white aesthetics belies the complexity of its challenges.



GRAVITY MANIPULATION

You must defy the laws of physics by stepping into the Void. Enter the Void to discover new pathways, solve intricate puzzles, evade enemies and unlock hidden secrets.



DESTRUCTIBLE TERRAIN

Utilize the environment to your advantage. Destroy any terrain to create barriers against deadly turrets and lasers, or carve your way to reach otherwise inaccessible heights.



FEATURES

  • Minimalist Art Style: Experience the elegance of pure black-and-white graphics that enhance the game's challenging and immersive nature.
  • Dynamic Puzzles: Engage with puzzles that require both brainpower and dexterity, offering a satisfying blend of cognitive and physical challenges.
  • Strategic Terrain Manipulation: Innovatively use destructible environments to block hazards, build paths, and create safe zones in real-time.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2016
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, x86_64 CPU, ARMv7 or ARMv8 CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full Vulkan 1.0 support
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2020
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, x86_64 CPU, ARMv7 or ARMv8 CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full Vulkan 1.2 support
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: Voidstepper

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, or any x86_64 CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full Vulkan 1.0 support
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: x86_64 CPU with SSE4.2 instructions, with 4 physical cores or more
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full Vulkan 1.2 support
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Experience the elegance of pure black and white in this unique platformer. Navigate through puzzle- and action-packed levels, manipulate gravity, and destroy terrain to overcome obstacles. Dodge mines, lasers, and turrets as you defy gravity and outsmart challenges.
